BlackNightmare:

"Becoming the faithfull and without conditon friend"said half 
sarcastic and half-sad"But I would be desparing watching him whitout 
have him"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> "We can figure out a way to keep him in your life and still let 
him be happy.  We just need to find out how," the femme said, 
leaning against the bulkhead behind her.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "What?"said the femme"What are you talking about?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > The femme rests a comforting hand on her sister's shoulder.  
> > "Don't worry, we will figure something out," she said with a 
> playful wink.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare:
> > 
> > "I don't know if I could live without him or stand watch him 
with 
> > other girl"said Blacknightmare trying to hold back her emotions
